text: Nicholas Prasad (born 7 December 1995) is a Canadian-born Fijian footballer who plays as a defender for Bischofswerdaer FV 08 in the Regionalliga. ==Personal life== Prasad was born in Edmonton, Alberta to Fijian parents. ==Career== ===Vancouver Whitecaps=== In 2011, Prasad joined the Vancouver Whitecaps FC Academy. A year later he made his senior debut with the Reserve Squad.https://www.whitecapsfc.com/youth/eliteteams/residency/nicholas- prasadhttps://www.whitecapsfc.com/post/2014/04/01/vancouver-whitecaps-fc- reserves-best-fc-edmonton-4-2-tuesday-thunderbird-stadium In 2014, Prasad appeared for USL PDL side Vancouver Whitecaps FC U-23.https://www.uslleaguetwo.com/2014-stats ===Seattle Redhawks=== In 2014, Prasad signed a letter of intent to play NCAA Division I college soccer at Seattle University. Prasad was a starter in all 4 years of eligibility. ===SpVgg Bayreuth=== In 2018, Prasad signed a one-year deal with Regionalliga side SpVgg Bayreuth. http://www.spvgg-bayreuth.de/tag/nick-prasad/ http://www.fussball.de/newsdetail/torwart-grgic-von-balakov-nach- bayreuth/-/article-id/189540#!/ ===Tulsa Roughnecks=== On July 16, 2019, Prasad signed with USL Championship side Tulsa Roughnecks.https://www.uslchampionship.com/news_article/show/1035346 ===Bischofswerdaer FV 08=== In January 2020, Prasad signed for Regionalliga Nordost side Bischofswerdaer FV 08. ==International Career== In 2019, Prasad was called into the Fiji national football team for friendlies against New Caledonia and Mauritius. On March 18, 2019 he made his debut against New Caledonia and recorded an assist in the game. Prasad has been a regular in Christophe Gamel's side since his debut. https://www.fbcnews.com.fj/sports/football/prasad-is-set-to-debut-for-fiji-in- fifa-international-friendlies https://fijisun.com.fj/2019/03/19/samuela- drudru-strike-twice-in-fiji-win/ In 2019, he was selected for the 2019 Pacific Games. Fiji won a bronze medal. ==References== ==External links== * * * Scores24.live Category:Living people Category:1995 births Category:Soccer people from Alberta Category:Sportspeople from Edmonton Category:Fiji international footballers Category:Fijian footballers Category:Canadian soccer players Category:Canadian people of Fijian descent Category:Association football defenders Category:Fijian expatriate footballers Category:Canadian expatriate soccer players Category:Fijian expatriates in Germany Category:Canadian expatriates in Germany Category:Fijian expatriates in the United States Category:Canadian expatriates in the United States Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:USL League Two players Category:Vancouver Whitecaps FC U-23 players Category:Seattle Redhawks men's soccer players Category:SpVgg Bayreuth players Category:FC Tulsa players Category:USL Championship players
title: Nicholas Prasad
